channel.title: Design on Chris Bennett
channel.description: Recent content in Design on Chris Bennett

item.title: Olympic Gas
item.description: There is a gas station down the street from our home. The prices, according to national averages (at at the time of writing this), are average. Not too high, not too low. Just right. But every time I go to pump gas, I have to double check to make sure I select the correct grade, because someone decided to put the regular unleaded in the middle, unleaded plus on the left, and super unleaded on the right.
